content.description: This is one of Anvil Boulders best and longest climbs. The crimpy moves off the sit start are the crux, but the final tilted sloper at the end of the sloping rail traverse tends to prolong climbers efforts.
content.protection: Plenty of pads to cover the jumbled boulders in the crash zone...and a spotter for your head as you pull the moves out of the crevice.
content.location: On the East face of the Free Willy Boulder, starting sitting down in the crevice right of Laser Cut.

content.description: Start down and right with sidepulls and bad feet. Make a powerful first move up and left to sloping pocket feature. Set up on crimps before making a large throw up and left, top-out above or out right. Variation: Larry, take the right trending middle crack up further before topping out, avoiding the large throw, similar grade.
content.protection: 3 pads minimum, more would be best.
content.location: This is the climb up and right of Lazer cut and the Sloper traverse.Â

content.description: Around the corner from Free Willy, start low with a sidepull and the triangle sloper around the corner and climb the left-leaning shallow crack and the arete. Rock over and scramble up the very tall slab. It is also possible to climb the crack direct.
content.protection: A couple pads and a spotter.
content.location: Around the corner from Free Willy to the right. Downclimb on the left side of the slab.

content.description: Campus start to classic beached whale sequence. Begin with two crimps in the overhang and pull to slopers at the lip. Grovel up the bubbly slab to the good holds just out of reach. Try it over and over!
content.protection: A couple pads and a REAL spot, beware of bashing your skull on the boulder to the left.
content.location: Furthest north boulders of the field, look for the beached-whale slab facing south.

content.description: Weird and fun little problem. Sds in left trending crack and make moves up and left to a thought provoking top. Take the slab to the top.
content.location: Problem is located on the south side of the large boulder near free willy/laser cut.

content.description: This boulder contains a few great lines ranging from V3 to V8/9. Laser Cut and Free Willy are probably the most popular.
